member.name: T:RapidPayAPI.EncryptionLibrary.AesEncryptor
member.summary: Provides AES encryption and decryption functionality.

member.name: M:RapidPayAPI.EncryptionLibrary.AesEncryptor.EncryptAES(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a plain text using AES encryption with the provided key.
member.param: The plain text to be encrypted.
member.returns: The encrypted data with IV included.

member.name: M:RapidPayAPI.EncryptionLibrary.AesEncryptor.DecryptAES(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts combined data (IV + ciphertext) using AES decryption with the provided key.
member.param: The combined data (IV + ciphertext) to be decrypted.
